feed.title: GitHub Emacs Lisp Daily Trending

entry.title: zk-phi/dotfiles
entry.summary:
zk-phi's Dotfiles

  • Setup (Mac)

Open Terminal.app.

Install Xcode CLI tool.

: xcode-select --install

Install homebrew (look the official page) and follow the instruction to add to PATH.

Clone this repo and submodules

: git clone https://github.com/zk-phi/dotfiles.git : cd dotfiles : git submodule update --init

Install must-haves via =Brewfile=.

: cd brew : brew bundle

Some packages may fail on Mac M1 machines. Try installing with =arch -arm64= that case.

: arch -arm64 brew install

Install runtimes with asdf.

: cd asdf : sh setup.sh

Change login shell (if it's not zsh yet)

: sudo vim /etc/shells # Add /usr/local/bin/zsh : chsh -s /usr/local/bin/zsh

(See also https://scrapbox.io/zkphi/Mac_PC_%E7%A7%BB%E8%A1%8C)

Build and install required fonts

â†’ https://github.com/zk-phi/nasia
